name: Reach Malayalam
description: Get the latest news on your favorite topics at reachmalayalam.com. Our news articles are in Malayalam, providing truthful, impartial reports and analysis on current events, with a special focus on Kerala. Install our web app for quick access. Based in Trivandrum, we have reporters covering all districts in Kerala and major cities in India. Welcome to the ultimate solution for true Malayali vaartha (മലയാളം വാർത്തകൾ)
